Isoken Ogiemwonyi bụ onye ọchụnta ego ejiji nke Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye nchoputa na onye isi oche nke akara ejiji "Obsidian" na ụlọ ahịa "ZAZAII"
A makwaara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị  chọpụtara Winterfell Ltd, nke nwere ụghalaahịa Le Petit Marche Nigeria na L'Espace
Ọ bụ onye mmeri nke 2012 MTN Lagos Fashion & Design Week/ British Council Young Creative Entrepreneur of the Year
Na 2013, akwụkwọ akụkọ ụwa, The Guardian, tinyere ya n'ime ụmụ nwanyị iri abụọ na ise kacha nwee mmetụta na Africa
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na ￼Mahadum Nottingham ebe ọ nwetara asambodo ịbụ onye ọka iwu
O nwekwara PGD na Luxury Management sitere na Glion Institute of Higher Education, Switzerland na MSc na Management sitere na Mahadum BPP, London
O nwetakwara diploma IB na Malvern College
Ruo afọ ise, Isoken ruru ọrụ dịka onye nchịkọta akụkọ na BellaNaija ma bụrụkwa onye nchịkọta na BNStyle
Ọ nwere nghọta na ọrụ dị iche iche - Ejiji, Branding, Media ma bụrụkwa ọkachamara Content Communications
Ọ bụ onye ndú mkpọsa dị ka onye ndụmọdụ nọọrọ onwe ya n'ikike dị iche iche maka ụdị dị ka Clinique,  Estee Lauder & Bobbi Brown na Sub Saharan Africa.
Ruo afọ atọ, Isoken bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ na BellaNaija Style wee hazie ọrụ nchịkọta na Strategy na BNStyle
Ọ nwere nghọta na ọrụ dị iche iche - Ejiji, Branding, Media ma bụrụkwa ọkachamara na content Communications

Ọ bụ onye ndú mkpọsa dị ka onye ndụmọdụ nọọrọ onwe ya n'ikike dị iche iche maka ụdị dị ka Clinique,  Estee Lauder & Bobbi Brown na Sub Saharan Africa. Ọ mepụtara ihe ngosi Smart Money Women TV na- egosi n'ụwa niile na Netflix
Ọ bụkwa onye isi nke imepụta ejiji ma zụlite mmekọrịta ọha na eze na ịzụ ahịa na ọrụ ụgbọ elu mbụ na Africa Magic na windo nke abụọ na Netflix
Isoken bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere Winterfell Ltd, nke nwere ụghalaahịa Le Petit Marche Nigeria na L'Espace
Ọ malitere n'afọ 2009 ụdị uwe nwanyị na ngwa ngwa aha ya bụ "Obsidian"

Le Petite Marche (LPM) bụ otu n'ime ụzọ nchọpụta ejiji mbụ na Nigeria, nke emepụtara iji mebie ọdịiche dị na ụlọ ahịa ejiji Nigeria ma nyere aka na nkesa na nkwalite nke ndị na-emepụta ejiji na Naijiria
E guzobere  ya n'afọ 2009
L'Espace bụ ụlọ ahịa ngalaba na Legọs emepụtara na 2011 site na enyemaka Isoken na Wonuola Odunsi.
Isoken bụ 2012 MTN Lagos Fashion & Design Week/British Council Young Creative Entrepreneur of the Year
Obsidian gosipụtara ọrụ ya na 2011 & 2012 MTN Lagos Fashion & Design Week
O sonyekwara na ngosi Pitti Immagine nke 2013 emere na Florence, Italy
Ọ malitere ụlọ ahịa ejiji na ịma mma Africa ọhụrụ aha ya bụ "ZAZAII" na Victoria Island, Lagos
Aaka ụlọ ahịa ahụ meghere na Toronto na afo 2015
